item.description: The deadline for the Atlassian Codegeist hackathon is in 11 days. Submissions are due July 13th before 5pm EDT. Don't worry, you still have time to build and win big.In as little as a few hours, you can build scalable apps using Atlassian's new cloud app development platform, Forge. Although Forge is still in beta, you can request access using the referral "Codegeist" and start building. There are prizes for Connect apps, Forge apps, and bonus prizes for Trello Power-Ups. Don't miss ...

item.description: Hey hey!This week, I want to give a special shoutout to the Grant For the Web x DEV Community hackathon winners and participants.
